title: New to PBE
body: ok so i got my first PBE account and when i logged in then logged back out like i was supposed to and im still lv 1 with no RP or IP what should i do?

replies.body:
When PBE accounts are made, we automatically give them a large amount of RP/IP so you can buy what you want to test. It may take some time for those numbers to adjust, but give it a bit and your currency totals should update soon. As for your level, we level up all PBE accounts to level 30 around midnight PST.

You can check up on some other neat PBE related stuff on our page [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ) if you ever need a refresher ^_^!
